Plot: A Chechen Muslim illegally immigrates to Hamburg, where he gets caught in the international war on terror.
Title: A Most Wanted Man
Writer: Andrew Bovell (screenplay), John le Carré (novel), Stephen Cornwell (additional writing)
Actors: Grigoriy Dobrygin, Philip Seymour Hoffman, Homayoun Ershadi, Mehdi Dehbi
tomatoConsensus: Smart, subtle, and steadily absorbing, A Most Wanted Man proves once again that John le Carre books make for sharp, thoughtful thrillers.
